For the following Japanese text from a research paper: 

"Matsubaraら（2022b）を参考にし、プレッシャーがある状況でボール保持者に対する1st DFを囲むように形成されているDSをADDSとした（図3）。"

Please IMPROVE its translation, which is presented below, in academic language. Please make sure to use commonly used terms that are relevant for the context:

"Referring to Matsubara et al. (2022b), the DS formed around the 1st DF against the ball holder in a pressure situation was defined as ADDS (Figure 3)."

Based on the insight provided by Matsubara et al. (2022b), we define the Defensive Structure (DS) formed encircling the first defensive fielder (1st DF) in proximity to the ball possessor during situations of pressure as ADDS (Abbreviated DS) (see Figure 3).
improve the following sentence: It may be a good idea to abbreviate the occurrence rate as OR to save space within the tables that appear later in the text.
To optimize table space usage in subsequent sections, it would be prudent to abbreviate the occurrence rate as OR.
